Tabletop
Tabletop accoutrements contribute a visual, yet practical element to your restaurant decor. At ACityDiscount select from a various types of dinnerware, plain and pattern flatware, water tumblers and glassware, linen tablecloths and napkins for your front-of-house. For casual restaurants we also offer a variety of accessories, including napkin dispensers, condiment holders, and menu covers and stands. Tips from the Experts: "It's important to know exactly what is going to be included as a part of every individual place setting. It may be tedious at first, but when ordering, it will help with item counts, and down the road, it will help with inventory." - Hap
